3 import subprocess
4 import rospy

9 class SoundException(Exception):
10  pass
11 
12 
13 class SoundFormatException(Exception):
14  pass
15 
16 
17 class SoundFileException(Exception):
18  pass
19 
20 
21 class Sound(object):
22 
23  def __init__(self, name, path):
24  self.__name = name
25  self.__path = path
26 
27  rospy.logdebug("{} | {}".format(self.__name, self.__path))
28  if not self.exists():
29  raise SoundFileException("File {} doesn't exists".format(self.__path))
30  if not self.is_empty():
31  raise SoundFileException("File {} is empty".format(self.__path))
32 
33  self.__duration = self.__get_sound_duration()
34 
35  def __str__(self):
36  return self.__name
37 
38  def __repr__(self):
39  return self.__str__()
40 
41  @property
42  def name(self):
43  return self.__name
44 
45  @property
46  def path(self):
47  return self.__path
48 
49  @property
50  def duration(self):
51  return self.__duration
52 
53  def to_msg(self):
54  return SoundObject(self.__name, self.__duration)
55 
56  def exists(self):
57  return os.path.exists(self.__path)
58 
59  def is_empty(self):
60  return os.path.getsize(self.__path) > 0
61 
62  def __get_sound_duration(self):
63  args = ("ffprobe", "-loglevel", "quiet", "-show_entries", "format=duration", "-i", self.__path)
64 
65  try:
66  output = subprocess.check_output(args).decode()
67  try:
68  return float(output.replace("[FORMAT]\nduration=", "").replace("\n[/FORMAT]\n", ""))
69  except ValueError:
70  raise SoundFormatException()
71  except OSError:
72  rospy.logerr('Please install ffmpeg with "sudo apt install ffmpeg" to use the sound interface.')
73  return 0
